title: Qualifications of commission members
context: §50-4 Qualifications of commission members. Each charter commission member shall be a registered voter and resident of the county for at least three years prior to the member&rsquo;s appointment. Elected officials of the state or county governments shall not be eligible for appointment. [L 1963, c 73, pt of §2; Supp, §143A-4; HRS §50-4; gen ch 1985] Attorney General Opinions Under §78-4 member of board or commission is not eligible for appointment to charter commission. Att. Gen. Op. 63-29.
